fieldDescription: Disabling achievements will not affect progress.
Disabling paintjobs will not affect unlocks.
Enabling will cause bounties to have a deadline. After the deadline, the bounty will expire.
Whether extra info will be displayed on the Subsystems widget when combat starts.
The hotkey text for displaying info will fade to this value after a second of not pressing it. 0 is invisible, while 255 is no fade out.
Keybind for viewing subsystem info in combat.

defaultValue: Keybinds for subsystems. They are used in order. If any are empty they will be ignored and the next available keybind will be used.
